message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $100 to you. Considering its value to you, I would like to propose a price of $85 for it. I hope this offer aligns well with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're offering, $85 is a bit too high for me right now.  I'm willing to pay $75 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering our ongoing dialogue, I am willing to adjust my offer to $80 for the product. I hope this proposal works better for you.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $80 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $78 for the product.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I hope we can finalize the deal.

I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. After considering your last offer, I believe we can reach an agreement. I am willing to sell the product for $79. I hope this price suits your budget and allows us to conclude this transaction.
